abstract: In anticipation of a global summit on the food crisis, the U.N. called on world leaders to agree to urgent measures to ease demand for grains and alleviate high food prices.
snippet: In anticipation of a global summit on the food crisis, the U.N. called on world leaders to agree to urgent measures to ease demand for grains and alleviate high food prices.
lead_paragraph: In anticipation of a global summit on the food crisis, the United Nations called on world leaders Wednesday to agree to urgent measures to ease demand for grains and alleviate high food prices.

headline.main: U.N. Report Seeks Action to Address Food Crisis
headline.print_headline: U.N. Report Seeks Action To Address Food Crisis
